thread.title: Ashley Hunt
thread.title_full: Community Tax reviewed by Ashley Hunt

author: Ashley Hunt
title: Ashley Hunt
text: I highly recommend CTR. They are a very professional and knowledgeable company. I have filed my taxes with them for the past two years. This year I brought them a tax letter from the state saying I owe money from 2014. CTR helped me understand the situation and addressed it on my behalf in a punctual manor. They are extremely reliable - I'd go nowhere else for any of my tax needs!
